data.app_name: Hololab VR - NCSG Inspection Foundation Module 2: Masonry Wood Insert
data.description:
**Hololab NCSG Module 02 Wood Burning Fireplace Inserts VR Application**

The Hololab National Chimney Sweep Guild VR application trains users in the critical skills needed to inspect and maintain wood-burning fireplace inserts to NCSG standards. The course features interactive slides, desktop activities, real-world simulations, and integrates with a Learning Management System. It challenges students with inspections of randomized issues in a virtual residential setting, ensuring they follow all necessary procedures.

**VR Controls and PPE –** Learn how to navigate the virtual environment while getting acquainted with essential personal protective equipment.

**Responsibility & Worksite Hazard Assessment –** Operate in a simulated environment to identify and mitigate hazards commonly encountered during inspections of wood-burning fireplace inserts.

**Familiarization –** Understand different types of wood-burning fireplace inserts and their common features.

**Fireplace Insert Inspection –** Utilize the official NCSG checklist to thoroughly inspect wood-burning fireplace inserts.

**Real-World Simulation –** Complete the inspection by correctly identifying issues with maximum safety awareness and forensic skills.

Data reports for review are saved and stored for engagement metrics and simulation performance analysis.

Any off-platform monetization of content accessible in this app conforms to the Oculus Bulk IAP or Subscription Licenses app policy outlined here: https://developer.oculus.com/policy/app-policies
